name: Out of control - GMTK
description:
Control a turn based character via sliders to defeat your opponent. However the decision is not completely up to you and it may be favourable for the decision to be taken from you increasing the power of the move.

The game has alot of room for improvements however seems to be a very flawed idea and i do not want to continue the development any further. I did however have fun creating the game.

Created by myself during the time constraints of the GMTK 2020 gamejam.
